item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Yair Gadelov. I have M.Sc at Electrical enginnering. I work about 15 yars 10 years as RT/Embbdeded SW enginner and before that I worked 5 yeasas an algorithm engineer. Yair Gadelov, M.Sc., Software Engineer more than a decade of vast experience in developing algorithms in integrated SW & HW systems. Yair is highly skilled in multiple coding languages. He has experience in leading projects, developing and designing products from scratch in fields of navigation and cutting-edge technologies such as 3d printing.
